alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Southern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 2:37PM MST until December 15 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM TUESDAY TO NOON MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches with local amounts up to 6 inches possible. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Sheridan Foothills. In Montana, Bighorn Canyon and Southern Big Horn. * WHEN...From 9 PM Tuesday to Noon MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Reduced visibility from blowing snow. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
